docs.title: Brain Dump Logs
docs.text: Welcome to my personal blog where I document free writing, thoughts, and random musings.

docs.title: About
docs.text: This is a private space for capturing ideas, reflections, and stream-of-consciousness writing. The format is intentionally loose and unstructured.

docs.title: Latest Posts
docs.text: Check out the Blog section for my latest entries.

docs.title: Blog
docs.text: This is where all my blog posts live. Each post is a free-form brain dump - thoughts, ideas, observations, and whatever comes to mind.

docs.title: Welcome to Brain Dump Logs
docs.text:
This is my first post in this new blog setup. I'm using MkDocs with the Material theme and the blog plugin to create a space for my free writing.

The goal here is to have a low-friction way to capture thoughts and ideas without worrying too much about polish or structure. Just pure brain dumping.

docs.title: Why This Format?
docs.text:
I've tried various blogging platforms and note-taking apps, but there's something appealing about:

  • Plain markdown files
  • Version control with git
  • Static site generation
  • Full control over the setup

This feels like the right balance between simplicity and functionality for personal writing.

docs.title: What to Expect
docs.text:
Posts here will be: - Unfiltered thoughts - Work-in-progress ideas - Random observations - Technical notes - Whatever comes to mind

No promises on quality or consistency - this is intentionally a rough, experimental space.
